name: USourceControlPreferences
doc: Settings for the Source Control Integration

bEnableValidationTag: Adds validation tag to changelist description on submit.
bEnableUncontrolledChangelists: Enables Uncontrolled Changelists features. The editor must be restarted for the change to be fully taken into account.
CollectionChangelistTags: List of lines to add to any collection on checkin
SpecificCollectionChangelistTags: Map of collection names and additional text to apply to changelist descriptions when checking them in
